nodes.text: Tager'na was a male Human merchant who lived on Tython during the Cold War between the resurgent Sith Empire and the Galactic Republic.
A Human male, Tager'na lived on the planet Tython where he ran a light armor-selling business located at the Jedi Order's training ground in the Tythonian Gnarls
Tager'na first appeared in the BioWare video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, released on December 20, 2011.
